label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_018
content:
## 2024-07-01 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 108
- Active: 101
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 47
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 7

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 36
- Standard: 35
- Placebo: 37

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.2
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 29.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.3
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 349.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 46.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.5
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.6
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 3.7
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.5

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.9
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.6
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 44.1
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.3
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 310.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 56.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 22.3
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.2
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 5.1
- Standard Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 1.4

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.7
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 50.9
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.2
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 274.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 36.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 20.2
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.5
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.8
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week Mean: 6.9
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses Per Week SD: 2.5

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 221
- Sessions Attended: 210
- Attendance Rate (%): 91.9

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.4

- WBC (k) SD: 1.8

- Platelets (k) SD: 47

- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 5.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-1846, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1827, Description: diaphoresis, Grade: 2, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1843, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-1877, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-1846, Description: pruritus, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-1843, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor
- PD ID: PM-PD-1834, Description: 6MWT not performed due to facility scheduling, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Physical therapy schedule coordinated across 22 sites
- Physical therapy schedule coordinated across 15 sites

### Notes
- Week 18: Pain management assessments on track. 108 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
